name: PEEK
description: Use this command to ‘peek’ at a specific location in memory.
syntax: PEEK offset FLD receiving_fld NCHR number_of_chrs

parameters.name: receiving_fld
parameters.description: The field that will receive the value at the specified memory location.

parameters.name: NCHR
parameters.description: The number of characters to get.

parameters.name: number_of_chrs
parameters.description: The number of characters to get. If you don’t specify a number here the program defaults to 1.

comments: This command, along with POKE, gives you a quick and easy way to check certain settings on a PC when you know the value will always be in the same location in memory.
